sentences.en: Don't stand under the mistletoe with anyone else but me.
sentences.cn: 除了我,不要和任何人站在槲寄生上.

sentences.en: He used the mistletoe as an excuse to kiss her.
sentences.cn: 他用槲寄生枝条为借口吻了她.

sentences.en: Holly, like ivy and mistletoe, is an evergreen.
sentences.cn: 冬青和常春藤、槲寄生一样，都是常绿植物。

sentences.en: Mark danced her under the mistletoe hanging from the ceiling fan.
sentences.cn: 马克在从天花板狂热者悬挂的解寄生之下跳舞了她.

sentences.en: Missed toll Mistletoe is apperent site a parasite plant.
Mistletoe long been a symbol of love, peace and goodwill.
sentences.cn: 槲寄生长期以来一直是爱情, 和平与善意的象征.

sentences.en: Out on the corridor, Karen took her stand under the mistletoe.
sentences.cn: 在过道外面, 克伦站在了槲寄生下.

sentences.en: Prepare to stand down sectors Redwood, Douglas, Cedar and Mistletoe.
sentences.cn: 各部门准备离开.红木 、 道格拉斯 、 雪松、和槲寄生.

sentences.en: The mistletoe plant is a parasite on trees.
sentences.cn: 槲寄生是寄生于树上的植物.

sentences.en: The traditional Christmas mistletoe is native to Europe a parasite plant.
sentences.cn: 传统的圣诞槲寄生从本地流畅到欧洲.

sentences.en: There is almost always some mistletoe hung at these parties.
sentences.cn: 这些聚会上都会挂有槲寄生.

sentences.en: To study a new extraction method of mistletoe flavonoids by ultrasonic technology.
sentences.cn: 运用超声波辅助法提取槲寄生中黄酮类物质.

sentences.en: Today, some people hand mistletoe in a doorway at Christmas.
sentences.cn: 今天, 一些人在圣诞时将榭寄生挂在门口.

sentences.en: Today, some people hang mistletoe in a doorway at Christmas time.
sentences.cn: 今天, 在圣诞节的日子里,很多人把槲寄生放在门口.

sentences.en: Today, some people mistletoe in a doorway at Christmas time.
sentences.cn: 今天, 有人在圣诞节时把它悬挂在家门口.

words.tran_cn: [中医]槲寄生（一种常用作圣诞节室内悬挂的植物）

trans.tran_en: Mistletoe is a plant with pale berries that grows on the branches of some trees. Mistletoe is used in the United States as a Christmas decoration, and people often kiss under it.
